response.overview: A tour of the main titles of recent Spanish fiction through the experience and testimonies of its protagonists. Cristina Teva and Laia Portaceli bring together some of the most representative faces in 6 meetings: Paco León and Rodrigo Sorogoyen; Anna Castillo and Anna R. Costa; Javier Ambrossi and Javier Calvo; Mariano Barroso and Álvaro Morte; Leonor Watling and Javier Gutiérrez and Alberto Rodríguez and Marian Álvarez. A new original program from Movistar Plus that reviews how Spanish fiction has evolved in recent years. It consists of a single 50-minute episode. As an appendix, the six matches will be broadcast individually as independent programs.
response.title: Historias de ficción
